name: Artophobia
description:
Bread, Guns, Insanity.

Fight your way through 10 minutes of a chef's worst nightmare with several upgrades to your disposal.

Credits:

- Archie Jaskowicz (Programmer, Level Design)

- Luke Craven (UI Artist)

- Carl Hodgson (3D Modeller)

- Max Breeze (3D Modeller, Level Design)

- Joey Leach (Icon Artist)

- Sound Effects from Epidemic Sounds

- Music from Freesounds.org
